reviewText: Tandem Surfing: The Love Story is an amazing documentary about the beautiful and demanding sport of tandem surfing featuring male-female couples. Professional tandem surfers demonstrate their extraordinary skills amid the waves, and vintage footage from California tandem surf legends Steve & Barrie Boehne round out this exceptional presentation. A treat for armchair travelers and sports fans, Tandem Surfing: The Love Story lives up to its title and is highly recommended.
